explanation: [0-0] A man is sitting on a light-colored carpet in front of a TV. He is wearing a white T-shirt and blue shorts, holding a wine bottle, biting the cork with his mouth, and holding a wine glass in the other hand. The TV is placed on a low cabinet made of light-colored wood.
[0-3] Then a gray cartoon bull in a blue police uniform appears on the TV screen, with a white background. The man bites off the cork, spits it out, and then pours the red wine into the glass.
